content:
My understanding is that the IEEE system reference is urn:iso:std:iso:11073:10101. However, in the Forge drop down list it is urn:std:iso:11073:10101. Is there a way to override this value?

It turns out I can just write it in...
Hi @Brian Reinhold you can also enter a custom value in the textbox. Thank you for reporting this, I'll correct the URI in the next Forge release.
Thanks, I just discovered that. I am so used to drop downs that are just a list of enum options I didn't try at first just to enter my own text. I just added the missing 'iso' and it works fine.
